summary: Add the Hentai Demonis (retextured as Mithris by Korana) armor from oblivion. Now Called \'Demothris, Talos\'s Amazon\'
descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/638/dlcopie5.png/][IMG]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/2212/dlcopie5.png[/IMG][/URL]
[IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/2282/descriptionw.png[/IMG][/center]

[b]Hi and welcome on my mod. You loved the Push up Bikini ? Unfortunately this is not practical for killing dragons. This a solution for you :
This mod is a convertion of Hentai Demonis armor by Zotmann12 and the retexture by Korana. I add to it my push up body to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. The breasts are not wood, they own a physic. According to the clothing worn they change shape and adapt. This mod correct that. The effect is more noticeable if you have a character with a big chest. Remember, it is not animated, it has to be considered as a clothe.[/b]

You can have all the bonus of light armor. The defence is like the glass armor.
You can upgrade the armor at forge.

Important note : the armor can be combined with Dark Lilith Armor.

The armor is located in a chest in Solitude next to the execution place.

[IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/2514/aword.png[/IMG]
The Pushup body is a modified body from Caliente made by me. It \"equip\" the most of my clothing mods to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. [color=red]That why all my mods are uncompatible with other type of body [/color]. This body works perfectly with all the CBBE original bodies. See my others mods to see more examples. It doesn\'t replace anything.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/713/s1copie2.png/][IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/6877/s1copie2.png[/IMG][/URL]


[b]Q : The push up Effect affect all the body/armor of the game ?[/B]

-No, only the clothes or armors called \"pushup\" will give you with effect. It is a body replacer dedicated to certain body armor I made.

[b]Q : Next project ? [/B]

-Yes, it is a secret !

To give me motivations, please endorse ^^

[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8249/udpate.png[/IMG]

[b][color=orange]Version[/color][/b] 1.0 05/04/2012 (currently version)

[IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/6420/dlinstallation.png[/IMG]

- Make sure tu use the lastest update or the desired version.
- Make sure you have the lighe \'\'bEnableFileSelection=1\'\' in SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Launcher].
- Make sure \"Demothris .esp\" is checked in Data Files in the Skyrim launcher or in Nexus mod Manager.
- If you update, copy files into data directory and click Ok to overwrite files.

[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1424/recomm.png[/IMG]

[color=orange]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body CBBE by Caliente[/URL] [/color]

[IMG]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2119/bugsyl.png[/IMG]

Not yet

[IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6623/creditseq.png[/IMG]

* Caliente for her beautiful CBBE.
* Zotman12 for his original work on Oblivion.
* Korana For her retexture.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/838/licecing.png/][IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/1735/licecing.png[/IMG][/URL]
